│                            'GigE0/0/2', 'vlan': 200, 'enabled': False}, {'name':                 │
│                            'GigE0/0/3', 'vlan': 300, 'enabled': True}]                           │
│    w       vlan_config     {'vlan_100': 'management', 'vlan_200': 'data', 'vlan_300':      map   │

│                                                                    w: defined in workflow        │
